section.name: Maven helper plugins
section.p: Various Maven plugins have been created to help in the Mevenide Development Process. For now there are two plugins :

ul.li: Maven Eclipse-Plugin Plugin creates Eclipse plugins, features and site artifacts.
Maven Spinner-Wiki Plugin generates Spinner Wiki templates that have the same look-n-feel than the maven generated site.
Maven NBM (NetBeans Module) plugin will create a Netbeans module file (.nbm)
Maven JBuilder OpenTool plugin creates JBuilder OpenTool extension packages.
Maven Mavenide plugin is a helper plugin for running and debugging Maven projects from the IDEs.

section.p: Those Maven plugins can be found under the in the Mevenide repository.
